name: Potato
description:
Potato was a solo project for Ludum Dare#36

Updated: Polished and fixed for a college assignment jam with the theme of "Opposites"! Two opposites can be seen here, the opposite to an Irish person, a potato, and the opposites of forward and back while swinging :D! You can download the LD version or the College Jam one with the 'Paul' name below!

PostLD:Twas my first solo game jam and I spent most of my time programming which was crazy difficult for me. I'm primarily an artist/animator so It was enjoyable enough.

#LDJAM

Game Design/Development and Art/Animation by : @Kalobrienz

Music by: @Robert_Hughes2
